lmm.model

Interface IModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Model

    public interface IModel
    Defines the model of the LMM application.
    Author:
    Marco Sperandeo

      • addFilm

        void addFilm(java.lang.String newTitle,
           java.lang.Integer newPrice,
           java.lang.String newPlot,
           java.lang.Integer newDate,
           FilmType newGenre,
           java.lang.String newCover)
             throws InvalidContentException
        Add a film to the model.
        Parameters:
        newTitle - string title
        newPrice - price of the film
        newPlot - plot of the film
        newDate - release date
        newGenre - genre of the film
        newCover - default cover
        Throws:
        InvalidContentException - combination of data entered incorrect

            FilmType newGenre,

              throws InvalidContentException
        Edits an existing film.

        newTitle - string title
        newPrice - price of the film
        newPlot - plot of the film
        newDate - release date
        newGenre - genre of the film
        newCover - default cover
        newTrailer - boolean trailer
        Throws:
        InvalidContentException - combination of data entered incorrect
